summary_teim: Alan Freed, Jerry Lee Lewis, Little Richard, and Elvis Presley are inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame at its inaugural ceremony. Paul Shaffer and his band perform.
summary_ssm: Alan Freed, Jerry Lee Lewis, Little Richard, and Elvis Presley are inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame at its inaugural ceremony. Paul Shaffer and his band perform.
contents_teim: Scott Muni inducts Alan Freed [cont'd from 6B] -- Norm N. Nite inducts Alan Freed -- Lance Freed accepts award for Alan Freed -- Jann Wenner introduces Hank Williams, Jr. -- Hank Williams, Jr. inducts Jerry Lee Lewis -- Jerry Lee Lewis accepts his award -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Roberta Flack -- Roberta Flack inducts Little Richard -- Marvin Blackman accepts the award for Little Richard -- Jann Wenner introduces Julian and Sean Lennon --Julian and Sean Lennon induct Elvis Presley -- Jack Soden and George Klein accept the award.
contents_ssm: Scott Muni inducts Alan Freed [cont'd from 6B] -- Norm N. abstract_ssm: This is footage from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony on January 23, 1986. Scott Muni and Norm M. Knight induct Alan Freed -- Family of Alan Freed accepts the award on his behalf -- Jann Wenner introduces Jerry Lee Lewis -- Hank Williams, Jr. inducts Jerry Lee Lewis -- Jerry Lee Lewis acceptance speech -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Little Richard -- Roberta Flack inducts Little Richard -- Marvin Blackman accepts the award for Little Richard -- Jann Wenner introduces Elvis Presley --Julian and Sean Lennon induct Elvis Presley -- Jack Soden and George Klein accept the award on his behalf.
